synopsis.text: Asakura Hana, son of the renowned Yoh and Anna Asakura, finds his life far from the thrilling adventure he yearns for. But when a battle lands on his doorstep, the source of the conflict is shockingly close to homeâ€”his own kin! The Asakura family becomes embroiled in a power struggle, as Hana must harness his shamanic abilities to protect his loved ones in this action-packed sequel to SHAMAN KING (2021). (Source: Inspired by Kodansha USA)
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
